name: The D'Amelio Show
overview: From relative obscurity and a seemingly normal life, to overnight success and thrust into the Hollywood limelight overnight, the Dâ€™Amelios are faced with new challenges and opportunities they could not have imagined.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As personal and professional relationships overlap, the D'Amelio family faces new challenges at every turn, from public scandals to maintaining mental health, as they share the truth behind their online lives.
